page.title: 07Glendale Choral Society
page.content: The Choral Society have been together since about 1970.They have produced shows such as Iolanthe,The Mikado,HMS Pinafore and The Gondoliers.Most of the productions have been the works of Gilbert and Sullivan. There are about 16 men and 23 women in the society.Some have been in the society since the beginning.Shows are staged in the spring each year and there are usually four performances. People travel from all over north Northumberland to see the show. Money for the society is raised through coffee mornings,dances and other shorter performances during the year.
